nodes.text: The Rantofaran Conglomerate was an organization that existed during the time of the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, Supreme Chancellor Palpatine of the Galactic Republic enquired to Jedi Master Yoda about the location of the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and claimed that he sought for Skywalker to speak to a delegation from the Rantofaran Conglomerate about the life of a Jedi.
